markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5070) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 217 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Cleric](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=212)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5067)

</column>

---

As your understanding increases, your god grants you more divine spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from cleric archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank other than your two highest cleric spell slots.
name: Divine Breadth
